ygData.subject: Re: level 20 pet location
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/18/99 11:09:29 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... The only place I was able to find it was Grobb (the TROLL city, not the Ogre City) ... though
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/18/99 11:09:29 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
markm@... writes:

> Well I made the elusive level 20 last night, made the trek from the Karanas
> to Neriak to purchase my new spells, and lo...Animate dead wasn't there. I
> did a quick search and found another level 20 necro, and he tells me that
> the spell is in Oggok...hooray! :) before I make this long journey I wanted
> to check with you folks and make sure no one had found it closer to the
> homeland.

The only place I was able to find it was Grobb (the TROLL city, not the Ogre
City) ... though it may be in the Ogre City also...

The 24th is there also ... so get it while you are there ... and a few other
of the hard to find 20 and 24th spells...

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
